title: Shake​
content: since v0.1.0-alpha </> GoldenShake:Shake( toShake: Instance ,-- The instance to shake frequency: number,-- Speed of the Shake amplitude: number,-- Magnitude of the shake (larger number = larger shake) fadeInTime: number,-- Fade-in time before max amplitude shake priority: Enum ,-- Render priority of shake (probably best to leave this nil for default) rotInfluence: Vector3 ,-- Multiplies against shake vector to control final amplitude of rotation rotClamp: number,-- Limiter for how much the rotation can change (more info in Config) motionBlurEnabled: bool-- Whether to enable motion blur (more info in Config) ) → () A custom function using Sleitnick's Shake module (All of these arguments have default values based on toShake's ClassName, and most are used for Shake's creation. Learn more at https://sleitnick.github.io/RbxUtil/api/Shake/)
